mapper.sql: b.id rid,b.gmt_create,b.gmt_modified,b.borrow_no,b.user_id,b.borrow_days,b.amount,b.status as status,b.remark,b.card_number,b.card_name, b.overdue_day,b.overdue_amount,b.arrival_amount,b.gmt_arrival, b.poundage,b.rate_amount,b.overdue_status,b.review_status,b.repay_amount,b.address,b.rish_order_no, b.gmt_plan_repayment gmtPlanRepayment,b.sum_rate sumRate,b.sum_overdue sumOverdue,b.sum_rebate,b.sum_renewal_poundage,b.renewal_num renewalNum, b.province,b.city,b.county,b.address as idcardAddress,b.success_num,b.poundage_rate,b.base_bank_rate,b.user_coupon_id,b.coupon_amount,b.activity_amount
mapper.select: SELECT b.id FROM lsd_borrow_cash b where b.is_delete= 0 and b.gmt_plan_repayment <#{startDate} and status= 5 order by id desc limit 1

SELECT b.id FROM lsd_borrow_cash b where b.is_delete=0 and b.gmt_plan_repayment >= #{beginTime} and b.gmt_plan_repayment < #{endTime} and b.status =5 and not exists(select borrow_id from lsd_repayment_borrow_cash where is_delete=0 and status=2 and borrow_id = b.id) and not exists(select borrow_id from lsd_repayment_offline_log where is_delete=0 and status=0 and borrow_id = b.id)
SELECT b.id FROM lsd_borrow_cash b where b.is_delete = 0 and b.gmt_plan_repayment < #{nowTime} and b.status = 5 ORDER BY b.id desc

SELECT
,uc.mobile FROM lsd_borrow_cash b left join lsd_id_number ain on b.user_id=ain.user_id left join lsd_user_bankcard uc on b.user_id=uc.user_id where b.is_delete=0 and uc.is_main = 1 and uc.status=1 and b.status =5 and b.id in ( #{item} )
